DataElement.preferredName: Negation Acceptable Useful Vision Expectancy Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator as to whether no reasonable useful vision is expected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Satisfying an established set of qualifying measures.:Helpful for doing or achieving something._The faculty of vision, the perception of objects by the eye._Something expected, especially the value (e.g. an amount, or length of time) or probability of occurrence for a specific event based on statistical calculations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The values that are permitted for the usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event. [Source: NCI]

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is no reasonable useful vision expected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have no reasonable expectation for any useful vision in the Group D eye as determined by the treating physician?
